meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1562.

td.p: Mickey Tennenbaum, a teacher originally from The Hague, Holland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,500)

tr.td: WORLD GEOGRAPHY
SEWING
PROVERBS
ZOOLOGY
SPORTS TRIVIA
TV DADS

(Alex: [*], yes.)
---

Sol

Donald
')
